scripts.prepare:deploy: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const deployDir='deploy'; if(fs.existsSync(deployDir))fs.rmSync(deployDir,{recursive:true,force:true}); fs.mkdirSync(deployDir,{recursive:true}); ['index.html','style.css'].forEach(f=>{if(fs.existsSync(f)){fs.copyFileSync(f,path.join(deployDir,f));}else{console.warn('âš ï¸ æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨:',f)}}); if(fs.existsSync('dist')){fs.mkdirSync(path.join(deployDir,'dist'),{recursive:true}); const jsFiles=fs.readdirSync('dist').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.js')); jsFiles.forEach(f=>{fs.copyFileSync(path.join('dist',f),path.join(deployDir,'dist',f));});}else{console.warn('âš ï¸ distç›®å½•ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¯·å…ˆè¿è¡Œ npm run build')}; console.log('ðŸŽ‰ éƒ¨ç½²æ–‡ä»¶å‡†å¤‡å®Œæˆ!')"
scripts.build:local: npm run build && npm run prepare:deploy
